meanings.sent1: The uncollected toys were scattered all over the room.
meanings.sent2: The uncollected papers were left on the desk.
meanings.sent3: The uncollected socks seemed to have a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like uncollected puzzle pieces, waiting to be put together.
meanings.sent5: The uncollected leaves in the yard created a colorful carpet.

meanings.definition: Not paid or gathered in revenue
meanings.sent1: The uncollected bills piled up on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent2: The uncollected taxes caused a financial strain.
meanings.sent3: The uncollected fees danced around in his mind like a forgotten tune.
meanings.sent4: Her uncollected debts loomed over her like dark clouds.
meanings.sent5: The uncollected funds affected the project's progress.

meanings.sent1: The uncollected pieces of the puzzle were missing.
meanings.sent2: The uncollected furniture parts cluttered the room.
meanings.sent3: The uncollected Lego blocks seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her uncollected thoughts were like scattered fragments of a story.
meanings.sent5: The uncollected ingredients on the counter puzzled her.
